price: Bu gerçek senin Rabbindendir. O halde sakın şüphe edenlerden olma!
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
